issue.title: [Rust] There should be a README in the top level rust directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4188](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4188). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Due to recent changes, the main README is now in the rust/arrow directory. We need to move the README up one level since it contains information about both the arrow and parquet crates.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4188?focusedCommentId=16736951) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3342
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3342>
